evidence.text: mediation of this case that took place on Monday, October 28, 2024
presented to the City Commission in a closed-door session on November 19, 2024

extracted.value: November 19, 2024: Settlement presented to City Commission in closed‑door session.

evidence.text: tentatively set for December 3, 2024 for final approval

evidence.text: directed to jointly file a status update regarding the progress of settlement approval on or before December 4, 2024

evidence.text: parties shall file the appropriate settlement documentation with the Court on or before December 17, 2024
